properties.entry: SELECT /* com.kh.admin.contact.model.dao.contactDao#selectContactList()*/ CON_NO , CON_TYPE , CON_TITLE , USER_NO , CON_DATE FROM CONTACT C WHERE C.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CON_NO DESC
INSERT /*com.kh.admin.contact.model.dao.ContactDao#insertContact()*/ INTO CONTACT ( CON_NO , CON_TITLE , CON_TYPE , CON_CONTENT , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
